<html>
            <head>
                <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
                <style type="text/css">
                    @font-face {
                        font-family: OpenSans;
                        src: url("file:///android_asset/fonts/opensans.ttf")
                    }
                    a {
                        color: #00838F;
                        text-decoration: none;
                    }
                    body {
                        font-family: OpenSans;
                        font-size: 12pt;
                        color: #444444;
                        margin: 16px;
                    }
                    iframe {
                        width: 90vw;
                        height: 50.625vw;
                    } /* 16:9 */
                    img, video {
                        display: inline;
                        height: auto;
                        max-width: 100%%;
                    }
                </style>
            </head>
            <body>%1$s</body>
        </html>
